name: promissory
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to, containing, or similar to a promise: Once the ownership of a property has been verified, a sale involves a promissory contract with details of the property, purchaser, and vendor. The firm was fined for violating the ban on using promissory language in advertising.
More examplesFewer examplesThe clause requirement to give the tenants notice was not promissory. The sections of the policy manual were expressed in such a way that they could not be regarded as promissory in nature.
